page.title: 04Our Village of Skewen.
page.content: Skewen is a large village with lots of buildings.People mostly work in the oilworks.This is known as B.P. Oil Refinery,Llandarcy.There are three big roads running through Skewen.One is full of shops.This is called New Road.Another skirts the back.This is called Old Road.The third is the biggest and is part of the M4 Motorway which runs through South Wales.A railway line also runs through the centre of Skewen.On this line runs a train called The Inter City 125.This is a very fast train which travels from London to Swansea.Nearby there is a river called th River Neath.In Skewen there are two large parks.These are called Skewen Park and Tennant Park.Drumau Mountain overlooks the whole village.
